alert.note: Alert for Hardee; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 6:51PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Hardee and southwestern Polk Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 651 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Auburndale to near Plant City. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Winter Haven, Bartow, Auburndale, Fussels Corner, Combee Settlement, Lakeland Linder Airport, Medulla, Jan Phyl Village, Fort Meade, Mulberry, Bowling Green, Eagle Lake, Homeland, Alturas, Winter Haven Airport, Wahneta, Willow Oak, Bradley Junction, and Inwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
